title: La Vuelta a España 2021 Standings after Stage 10
content:
General Classification / Red Jersey 

The breakaway were given a huge time gap in stage 10 of the Vuelta, so much so that Intermarche - Wanty's Odd Christian Eiking took the red jersey off Primož Roglič. Guillaume Martin was also in the breakaway and moved up to 2nd overall. Despite a late crash, Roglič attacked on the climb and put some more time in to his GC rivals such as Egan Bernal.

1. Odd Christian Eiking
2. Guillaume Martin +0:58
3. Primož Roglič +2:17
4. Enric Mas +2:45
5. Miguel Angel Lopez +3:38
6. Jack Haig +3:59
7. Egan Bernal +4:46
8. Sepp Kuss +4:57
9. Adam Yates +5:01
10. Felix Großschartner +5:42

La Vuelta a Espana 2021: Route, Predictions and Contenders

Points Classification

1. Fabio Jakobsen - 180 points
2. Jasper Philipsen - 164 points
3. Arnaud Démare - 74 points
4. Alberto Dainese - 73 points
5. Primož Roglič - 71 points

La Vuelta Stage 10 Preview

King of the Mountains Classification

1. Damiano Caruso - 28 points
2. Romain Bardet - 22 points
3. Michael Storer - 17 points
4. Pavel Sivakov - 16 points
5. Jack Haig - 15 points

Young Rider's Classification

1. Egan Bernal
2. Aleksandr Vlasov + 1:26
3. Gino Mäder +2:08
4. Juan Pedro Lopez +4:37
5. Rémy Rochas +16:54

Team Classification

1. Movistar Team
2. Bahrain Victorious +1:32
3. Jumbo Visma +7:31
4. Ineos Grenadiers +8:34
5. UAE Team Emirates +16:30

author: Peter Stuart
